GapFillDragDrop.Title: Money
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct word from the word pool to fill each gap.

Content.Question:
1. It doesn’t matter if the bank is closed as you can always use a cash machine to get money out.
2. Have you got any coins to pay for the ticket in the car park?
3. Jenny used her credit card to buy the flights to Paris as she didn’t have enough money in her
bank account.
4. We are advised to have some kind of pension plan so that we’ll have enough money to live on when we retire.
5. The service was incredibly slow and the waiter wasn’t that friendly so Isabelle didn’t leave
a tip.
6. The kidnappers demanded a ransom for the release of their captives.
7. Sonya found some antiques in her parents’ attic that she thought might be of some worth, but she later
found out they were valueless.
8. Michelle decided to send her daughter to a private school, but she had to work extra hours to find the money to pay the school fees.
9. The government has considered giving farmers subsidies to grow organic crops.
10. Some celebrity couples have a prenuptial agreement to safeguard their earnings should they split up at a later date.
